Subject: Urgent request from the marshmallow queen!
Paragraphs:
Dear sweet friends,

I hope this message finds you well and surrounded by marshmallows! I am writing to you today with an urgent request from the marshmallow queen herself.

As you know, marshmallows are the most important food group in the sweet kingdom. Without them, we would crumble into chaos and despair. That is why I need your help to ensure a steady supply of marshmallows for all of our subjects.

I am hereby ordering all of you to participate in the Great Marshmallow Hunt of 2023. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to scour the land for the rarest and most delicious marshmallows known to mankind. Bring them back to me and you shall be rewarded with all the marshmallows you can eat!

Remember, the fate of the sweet kingdom rests in your hands. Together, we can conquer any marshmallow-related challenge and emerge victorious.

Best wishes,
The Marshmallow Queen
